nodes.text: The Klasse Ephemora system consisted of the star Klasse Ephemora A and the gas giant planet Mobus. It was named after Klasse Ephemora, who discovered it several centuries BBY. The system was located on the far side of the Chiss Ascendancy from the Galactic Core.
It was around Mobus that the living planet Zonama Sekot orbited for nearly 50 years, from before the Clone Wars to the Yuuzhan Vong invasion.
